General.Name: Multi Agro Gemilang Plantation Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Multi Agro Gemilang Plantation Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the oil palm plantation business in Indonesia. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Multi Agro Gemilang Plantation Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Santika Griya Persada.
General.Address: Panin Bank Tower, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10270
